ExampleDefinition.Title: Box Plot
ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Demonstrates how to use create a Box Plot using SciChart
ExampleDefinition.Description: <Run FontSize="14" FontWeight="Bold">Box Plot</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13">Demonstrates how to use the BoxPlotDataSeries and FastBoxPlotRenderableSeries to display statistical data.</Run>
